lines.content: Welcome to Casio, your personal chatbot task manager!
Casio helps you stay organized with a variety of task management features.
List all current tasks in the task list using `list` command.
Add deadlines to task list using `todo` command.
Added todo: Assignment into the list.
You now have 1 task(s) in the list.
Add deadlines to task list using `deadline` command.
Added deadline: Assignment (by: 12 Dec 2024 12:30) into the list.
You now have 1 task(s) in the list.
Add events to task list using `event` command.
Added event: Lecture (from: 12 Dec 2024 12:30 to: 12 Dec 2024 13:30) into the list.
You now have 1 task(s) in the list.
Delete tasks from task list based off their index on the list. Use the `delete` command.
You now have 0 task(s) in the list.
Mark tasks as complete based off their index on the list.
Assignment marked as done. Good job!!
Unmark tasks based off their index on the list.
Sort the list of all current tasks by date and time using `sort /by time` command.
List is now sorted by date and time!
Enter 'list' command to see sorted list!
Search for a task in the task list with a keyword using `find` command.
* The main class of Casio the personal chatbot.
* Records user inputs, processes commands via {@link CommandParser},
* Tasks are stored and retrieved using {@link TaskStorage}, and the user interface

* Enters a loop to continuously read user input until the user chooses to exit.

* Manages an ArrayList of tasks and allows operations such as adding, deleting, marking, unmarking and sorting tasks.
* The class supports different types of tasks, including {@link Todo} , {@link Event}, and {@link Deadline}.
* Interacts with TaskStorage to ensure updates to tasks list are saved locally.
* Sorts the array list by date and time.
* Earliest on top, latest on the bottom.
* Todo tasks without date and time are sorted to the bottom of the list.

* Extracts task details from a string from the save file.
* Extracts the task type, status, name, date and time.

* @return String array containing parsed task details:

*
  • [3 - 4] - Task details ( deadline date time (by), event date time (from, to) )
* Returns an empty array if input is invalid.
return new String[]{taskType, taskStatus, taskName, taskDetails, from, to};
